context_bundle.content:
Memory leak detection and resolution.

Symptoms:
- Gradual memory increase
- OOM kills
- Performance degradation
- GC thrashing

Common Causes:
- Event listener accumulation
- Closure references
- Cache without eviction
- Circular references

Detection Tools:
- Chrome DevTools Memory tab
- Node.js --inspect + heap snapshots
- Valgrind for native code
- APM memory tracking

Fixes:
- Proper cleanup in useEffect/componentWillUnmount
- WeakMap/WeakSet for caches
- Event listener removal
- Breaking circular refs
